p: Recently, it was demonstrated that 4-(N-alkylpyridinium)-1,4-dihydropyridines possess toxicity in Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria species and eukaryotic microorganisms [ 18]. The abovementioned 4-(N-alkylpyridinium)-1,4-dihydropyridines also possess calcium channel-blocking and antioxidant activities [ 19].
